originalText.text: Fraudulent!!!!! We cruised from Ny to Bermuda 12/16-12/21/23. Unfortunately we never got to dock in Bermuda and instead of being brought straight back….we sailed around aimlessly for days going nowhere!!! Staff was rude, food was horrible, cleanliness was not practiced at all. I watched and tables were never wiped down between parties….only new table clothes put on. They continued selling excursions up until the captain made the announcement that we would not dock. They stole all our money!!! They offered a $200 non refundable credit per stateroom not person….we could only use it on the ship!! I paid $2400+ total and was offered $200. I also bought a 5 day spa package and they over sold the packages and could not accommodate everyone who bought them!! This was inhuman and horrible. I come back home and am now sick as a dog!!! I want a refund and they are willing to do nothing. I would never recommend this cruise line EVER… their customer service sucks!!!

originalText.text:
Went on the Norwegian Escape cruise 7 Day Canada and New England trip - Oct 15-22 2023. Thoughts:
Buffet was a buffet and not much more. Basically maybe a little higher end hotel food for breakfast. Lunch has good choices as well as dinner including Indian, Italian and Asian food. Definitely go to Taste and Savor or the Manhattan room instead if u can for dinner. They have specials not in the buffet and no charge. The wings in O'sheehans were incredible! I did enjoy the ribeye at the steak place and The beers and drinks all around the ship were good. The seafood at Bayamo was great! The steak at Cagney's was awesome. I recommend the ribeye. Le Bistro was great. I think the best deal was food republic. The salad bar at Moderno looked great but we did not eat there. The tapas bar was good for a light snack between meals. Room service....not recommended!!!!
Plenty to do including the pool area, mini golf, hot tubs, game rooms, dancing, dualing piano bar, concerts, shows, gambling, etc.
Everything was well run and no real hassle at all. I'm not big on tendering to go to port but it worked out when we did.
Staff is all very friendly and no task too small.

originalText.text: Just got home from my Norwegian cruise and I couldn’t wait to leave a review because it was such a bad experience.. The whole trip sucked so bad. We left from NYC to go to Bermuda. We never made it to Bermuda due to bad weather conditions. Why would Norwegian take us out to the middle of the ocean toward Bermuda, knowing there would be bad weather??? Just to turn around in choppy waters!!! The whole trip was extremely uncomfortable. They charge you upfront for “everything to be included” and then charge you service fees for everything on the boat. (Double charges) They refunded the room a measly $200 for inconveniences, but our whole point of travel was to see Bermuda. Not to be stuck on a boat the whole cruise paying double charges and eating the same food for 5 days! Someone stole my fiancé’s room key and used it at their will. We never received our refund after wasting time running back and forth to guest services and being told it was being investigated! I hated everything about this trip and all they care about is taking your money! We paid $4000 for absolutely nothing that was close to being worth it. I do not recommend this cruise line to anyone who values their hard earned money! They are a rip off!!!!

originalText.text:
I have cruised 6 X’S on Norwegian.  I’m getting ready to get on number 7 on July 1st, 2023., and I just cannot wait.  Simply put.. you’ll see quickly how you are treated like Royalty.!!  The crew and all the workers on the ship cannot be more accommodating and polite not to be compared.  Destination aside… there is so much fun and relaxation on the ship that you don’t even need to get off. Cmon July and sail cruise number 7.!!
CScav USA

originalText.text: NORWEGIAN Getaway - 6 days Bermuda. Extremely long waiting time for everything! The queue starts an hour before the restaurant opens. No clear instructions on how to get off the ship and shore excursion. Relative small ship and way too many people on board. This one star is for the attitude of attendants only. They are very enthusiastic and love their job.
